description:
I love Doom Emacs but I haven't used it in probably over a year now, because I have my own config that I created that mimics much of what Doom does.  But for this special live event, I will be installing Doom Emacs and playing around with the basic config files.  So if you are thinking about trying Doom Emacs, this might help you get started!

REFERENCED:
https://github.com/doomemacs/doomemacs
